title: 游戏无法启动
author: huangJK
txt_content:
游戏文件和启动器都是从本论坛的置顶下载的，游戏版本是1.12，启动器是HMCL2.77.29。JAVA也下了安装了，是JAVA8。点击
“启动minecraft”之后一会弹出一个日志。crash-reports如下：
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Daisy, daisy...

Time: 6/18/17 1:09 PM
Description: Initializing game

org.lwjgl.LWJGLException: Pixel format not accelerated
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.nChoosePixelFormat(Native Method)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.choosePixelFormat(WindowsPeerInfo.java:52)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsDisplay.createWindow(WindowsDisplay.java:247)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.createWindow(Display.java:306)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:848)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:757)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:739)
        at bhz.at(SourceFile:635)
        at bhz.aq(SourceFile:458)
        at bhz.a(SourceFile:404)
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:123)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-- Head --
Thread: Client thread
Stacktrace:
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.nChoosePixelFormat(Native Method)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.choosePixelFormat(WindowsPeerInfo.java:52)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsDisplay.createWindow(WindowsDisplay.java:247)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.createWindow(Display.java:306)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:848)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:757)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:739)
        at bhz.at(SourceFile:635)
        at bhz.aq(SourceFile:458)

-- Initialization --
Details:
Stacktrace:
        at bhz.a(SourceFile:404)
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:123)

-- System Details --
Details:
        Minecraft Version: 1.12
        Operating System: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1
        Java Version: 1.8.0_131, Oracle Corporation
        Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
        Memory: 79066616 bytes (75 MB) / 161480704 bytes (154 MB) up to 805306368 bytes (768 MB)
        JVM Flags: 6 total; -XX:HeapDumpPath=MojangTricksIntelDriversForPerformance_javaw.exe_minecraft.exe.heapdump -XX:+UseG1GC -XX:-UseAdaptiveSizePolicy -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -Xmn128m -Xmx768m
        IntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 0, tallocated: 0
        Launched Version: HMCL 2.7.7.29
        LWJGL: 2.9.4
        OpenGL: ~~ERROR~~ RuntimeException: No OpenGL context found in the current thread.
        GL Caps: 
        Using VBOs: Yes
        Is Modded: Probably not. Jar signature remains and client brand is untouched.

replies.author: 吕易天
replies.txt_content:
huangJK 发表于 2017-6-18 13:38
用驱动精灵什么的更新驱动也不管用咯？
不管用啦~~~~如果最新了还是不行就不行啦~~

replies.author: 吕易天
replies.txt_content:
huangJK 发表于 2017-6-18 13:34
问过其他人，他们说要更新显卡，但是我更新了也还是这样。。。难道只能换电脑了？？ ...
对啊，你显卡太差所以在加载的时候出现了问题。

replies.author: 吕易天
replies.txt_content: 可能是你显卡太差了的原因。。。

replies.author: 吕易天
replies.txt_content:

问过其他人，他们说要更新显卡，但是我更新了也还是这样。。。难道只能换电脑了？？ ...
